amendment.description: An amendment numbered 65 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of the Deputy Chief Executive Officer at the US Agency for Global Media to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 255 (Roll no. 489).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 255 (Roll no. 489).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
